cause.description:
Care Net Pregnancy Center has been helping out many young mothers and fathers throughout the years. They make sure you get the accurate information so you can make an informed decision on you unborn child. The baby bottle campaign is a fundraiser for a machine that they will have i their offices, and it's an ultrasound machine for patients to see what the unborn infant looks like in early stages of the pregnancy.
1. Educate young parents about all of their options
2. Decrease the numbers of abortions
cause.name: Care Net Baby Bottle Campaign
